title: SWISSWELL Long Sleeve Polo Shirts for Men collared Performance Golf Shirts Casual Workwear Office
description: Material: Our long sleeve polo shirts for men collection are made from 85%Polyester, 15% Rayon, Soft, Light Weight. Suitable for wearing all year round, especially in spring, autumn, and winter when layered
Design: Classic turndown collar, ribbed cuffs, solid color, long sleeve, Polo collar with two-button closure helps ventilate
Match: Regular fit ,can be dressed up or down, tucked or un-tucked. Easy to pair with Jeans, Chinos, Dress Pants, etc., can also be layered with jackets and suit jackets
Occasion: Comfortable fabric for everyday wear. Perfect for home, outdoor, office, meetings, dating, parties, and others. Also, it's an ideal gift for father, husband, boyfriend, or brothers
Warm Tips: Machine washable, please wash separately for the first time, do not bleach, warm iron if needed. We will provide excellent after-sales service in case of any problems.
